name: Farkle Fever
description: If you are a fan of dice games, this belongs on your list. Farkle Fever is a collection of six different great "press your luck" dice games that can be played solitaire or with up to four players. Included is the classic "Ten Thousand" version, as well as some high-bonus variations, a cutthroat version called "Hurdle Farkle", a "Farkle-less" varient called Zilch, and even one with a side-bet.
